titles.title: To modify and extend the suspension of duty on certain cases or containers used for electronic drawing toys, electronic games, or educational toys or devices.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 5/7/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description of certain cases or containers used for electronic drawing toys, electronic games, or educational toys or devices; and (2) extend temporarily the suspension of duty on such articles.
